observation_entries.condition_summary: This looks like a fiddle leaf fig, and it’s holding on well, though it’s showing some mild stress.
observations: Several lower leaves have brown, crispy edges
Leaf drop appears limited to older growth
Plant is positioned near a bright window indoors
observation_entries.internal_checklist_notes: Light appears bright but directional. Soil dryness suggests inconsistent watering. No visible pest damage. Growth posture is upright and stable. Latex sap toxicity risk noted for pets.
recommended_actions: Water thoroughly when the top inch of soil is dry
Increase humidity using a pebble tray or humidifier
Avoid moving the plant frequently to reduce stress
safety_flags: Toxic to pets if ingested; sap may cause irritation
observation_entries.user_note: My cat keeps sniffing around this one and it made me nervous.

care_history.action_taken: Moved plant to higher shelf away from pets
